General.Name: Hyweb Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Hyweb Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development of electronic government, book education, and electronic payment related software technology in China and internationally. Its products include HyCMS, a website management platform; Greeting, a paperless conference system; HyEIP, an administrative information portal; HyCase, an application review process engine; and eServices, a customer service system. The company's products also comprise HyRead, an e-book solution and mobile library-reading display machine; HyLib, a library automation system; Jumper, a library resource discovery service; and SpaceMe, a space management solution. In addition, its products consist of HyLoyal, a bonus points management system; HyPro, a credit card/debit card system; and HyPstar, a card data preparation system. Further, the company offers UHF RFID chip tags, security detection doors, self-checking machines, automatic book borrowing and returning station systems, librarian work systems, and RFID handheld book searching/inventory machines; and various consumer finance, retail banking, and payment solutions. Hyweb Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.
